def Load(widget):
entity = widget.Entity view = widget.View
if entity <> None : if entity.Fields["TIPO"].Value == 1 : view.FieldDefinitions["CLAUSULA"].Visible = False view.FieldDefinitions["PARAGRAFO"].Visible = False view.FieldDefinitions["ORDEMANTERIOR"].Visible = False view.FieldDefinitions["NOMEANTERIOR"].Visible = False view.FieldDefinitions["CONTEUDOANTERIOR"].Visible = False
else : view.FieldDefinitions["CLAUSULA"].Visible = True if entity.Fields["TIPO"].Value == 2 : view.FieldDefinitions["ORDEMANTERIOR"].Visible = True view.FieldDefinitions["NOMEANTERIOR"].Visible = True view.FieldDefinitions["CONTEUDOANTERIOR"].Visible = True
if entity.Fields["TIPOALTERACAO"].Value == 1 : view.FieldDefinitions["PARAGRAFO"].Visible = False else : view.FieldDefinitions["PARAGRAFO"].Visible = True else : view.FieldDefinitions["ORDEMANTERIOR"].Visible = False view.FieldDefinitions["NOMEANTERIOR"].Visible = False view.FieldDefinitions["CONTEUDOANTERIOR"].Visible = False view.FieldDefinitions["PARAGRAFO"].Visible = False
